front.title: Camellia Galois Counter Mode (GCM) Cipher Suites for TLS

abstract.t: This document describes the use of the Camellia in Galois CounterMode (GCM) as a Transport Layer Security (TLS) authenticatedencryption operation. This document defines TLS cipher suites thatuse Camellia-GCM with RSA, DSA, Diffie-Hellman-based key exchange andElliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC).
